name: The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Trivia Challenge
name_original: The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Trivia Challenge
description:
The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Trivia Challenge is a game developed by Gunnar Games. It came out on 01-06-2002. Activision Value Publishing published the game.
The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Trivia Challenge is available on PC.
